articles.title: Tiger King: Signature on will of Carole Baskin’s husband was ‘100 per cent’ forged, Sheriff confirms - The Independent

articles.content:
The will of Carole Baskins late husband, whose death is explored in the Netflix series Tiger King, has been proven to be forged, a Florida Sheriff confirmed.
